pages.text: $(o)Culinaire adds a variety of foods, but primarily adds a way to make custom sandwiches!

pages.title: SANDWICH MAKING
pages.text: $(o)In your crafting grid, you can place Bread in the center of the Top and Bottom rows, then any 3 food ingredients in the middle row.

pages.title: MAKING TEA
pages.text: $(o)You can make yourself some Tea Bags and a Kettle, and brew yourself some tea!$(br2)Set the Kettle onto the ground, then place a warm block next to it (such as Magma Block, Campfire, etc). Then you can Right Click a Bucket of Water to fill the kettle, and put the teabag in to steep. $(br2)When its done, just Right Click an Empty Bottle onto the Kettle.
